title: Masterclass: Implementing AI Governance in Clinical Settings
summary: Module 1: A step-by-step guide to establishing an algorithmic safety committee. We cover the charter, the stakeholders, and the initial audit framework.

body.alt: Video Thumbnail showing Dr. Thorne lecturing

children.text: Define the roles required for a Clinical AI Safety Committee.
Draft a 'Model Card' policy for vendor procurement.
Establish a 'Red Button' protocol for algorithm suspension.
Governance fails when it is purely IT-driven. Your committee must include clinical champions.
